extendedInfo.description: Copy text from ANYWHERE on your phone. Use this to have copy paste functionality from ANY app or screen!**If you are upgrading from a previous version, please UNINSTALL the app and then REINSTALL. A simple update will not work.**"Copy Text" is an application that lets you copy text of ANYTHING on your phone and into your clipboard. Then, paste it into any text box by long-pressing on it. This application works on ALL phones.ROOT IS NOT REQUIREDThis application is the non-root version of the popular application, "Copy Paste It". If you have a rooted phone, please download "Copy Paste It" instead.PLEASE READ CAREFULLY BEFORE INSTALLING:This application will instruct you to download and install a free desktop application on your Windows or Mac. Once installed, you must run the desktop application with your phone attached to your computer. This will enable screenshots on your phone. Once you've done this, you can disconnect your phone and copy text whenever you want. However, every time you restart your phone, you'll have to connect it to your computer and run the desktop application again. If you restart your phone frequently, this app may not be for you, as it may prove to be too inconvenient. Your phone will NOT be rooted or temp-rooted in any way. No system files on your phone will be altered.  - Copy text to clipboard using on-board or networked OCR recognition.- Copy to clipboard by shaking phone.- Copy to clipboard by long-pressing on search button.- Copy to clipboard by pressing overlay button.- Support for many different languages.Tags: Copy Paste Clipboard

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Fantastic app. This isn\'t just really convenient; it actually creates functionality that didn\'t even exist to start with! Simply superb! Well worth paying for.
reviews.author: Alexander Wedekind

reviews.title: Copy text app not worth the money
reviews.comment: I jnstalled this on galaxy s3 and didnt work well, asked for refund about 5 times, just ignored me and kept updating the app,  the buttons I have to press takes a snapshot of the screen then you have a picture you have to go back and delete, and after that it wont paste into the notes app I use. Iphone is much better, you can copy and paste in any app and its built in iphone, dont have to download an app to accomplish it. For me and the way I need to copy and paste its no good, and you cant get a refund.
reviews.author: Tim Winningham

reviews.title: Copy Text
reviews.comment: Sorta frustrating to have \'Copy-Paste It\' changed to be usable on rooted phones only when it was working so well on my non-rooted phone for so long.  Thanks for the notice with the last update of \'Copy-Paste It\'  to install \'Copy Text\'.  I did and it accomplishes everything the previous version of \'Copy-Paste It\' accomplished for me.  Just what I need it to accomplish for me, copy and paste or cut and paste from anywhere to anywhere.  \'Copy Text\'  is there working like I need if to work.
reviews.author: J. Thomas

reviews.title: A real boon...
reviews.comment: Sharing text from sources which do not allow copying is now possible for me (like nuggets from ebooks). I have been using this for 3 days now on my Note 2 and find it real good & easy to use. While some people may find taking the sceenshot and then making the text selection cumbersome,  it seems the best way out as of now. A suggestion to the Developer- it would be good if other apps like Whats App, etc are integrated so that the copied text can be directly sent from the desired app. Thanks.
reviews.author: Kapil Chawla

reviews.comment: To put it mildly, its a piece of crap. Installed it on my phone and when I went to use it just by going through the tutorial an error message comes up saying that it couldn\'t take a screenshot. I then go to the website that is on the error message and it tells me that I basically have to plug my phone into a computer and download a bunch of crap to get it to work. No thanks. Refund please!

reviews.title: Works as advertised
reviews.comment: After reading several reviews, it would appear that most of the reviewers did NOT read and/or follow the instructions.  In fact, most of the issues people seem to have with apps in general are a result of having a cheap droid.  Also, most users don\'t understand that due to limitations of the hardware or the version of Android you\'re running have their limits.  I am by no means a developer.  However, I have been building, fixing and working with things like networks and other computer hardware for years.  So I (as a user) understand why things don\'t always work to the expectations of your average user.  You guys need to get over yourselves.  This developer has made a very decent piece of software.  It would be great if somehow a scroll feature could be added to the copy area so that if you have a great deal of text (I\'m visually impaired so I use it for speech). But folks, bottom line. This is an excellent app for what it does.  So try reading the directions for once. There\'s no need to trash the developer because YOU won\'t take the time to follow instructions.
reviews.author: David K

reviews.title: Don\'t waste your money
reviews.comment: Useless app because it takes about two mins. For the crop box to appear. I emailed the developer but no solution until now. Why this app does not even have trial version? Seems like all dev wants is money. 6.99 for an app which is so slow to respond is ridiculous.
reviews.author: A Google User
